name: Zirconium nitrate
desc: Zirconium nitrate is a volatile anhydrous transition metal nitrate of zirconium with formula Zr(NO3)4. It has alternate names of zirconium tetranitrate, or zirconium(IV) nitrate.
Other names: zirconium tetranitrate, tetranitratozirconium, zirconium(4+) tetranitrate, zirconium(IV) nitrate
Related compounds: Zirconyl nitrate, hafnium nitrate, titanium nitrate, zirconium perchlorate
